works.complaint:
A piece of content in the url  hyperlink has already  
been removed by the webmaster but still appears among the search results on  
google. this is it

"My Fast Trax show 26.04.07 Video by Pete Tong - Myspace Video
vids.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=vids.individual...27 Apr 2007 – INTRA  
RECORDS and Elad Avnon have screwed Joel Tellier and his production company  
for the full cost of the music video for Myore's 'No ..."

Despite the fact that Google may not have actually ‘posted’ these  
statements, Google are clearly the ‘publisher’ given the fact that you  
control the hyperlink and, as such, google are liable. In the circumstances  
we hereby put you on notice that unless you permanently remove from google  
search  the statements above complained of by 11.59pm on 20th January 2012,  
we will issue legal proceedings against Google for defamation in the  
English Courts.

The comments made are untrue and therefore amount to defamation of  
character which has and will continue to have a serious affect on me. The  
comments in addition make entirely unfounded allegations of illegality,  
which has resulted in substantial losses to me of which you are liable  
along with the persons who posted the comments. Even if the statements are  
true, which is entirely denied, this is not an illegal act which we  
consider provides an ordinary reader with the view that i have undertook a  
fraud within the meaning of the Fraud Act 2006.

We look forward to receiving confirmation that the Comments have been  
withdrawn.

Yours faithfully,

Elad Avnon
